docs.snippet: A variety of scientifically validated tools exist to measure a player’s reaction time, which is slower after a concussion, but most require a computer and sophisticated software. A simple new technique can be used on the sidelines and meets the ...
docs.abstract: A variety of scientifically validated tools exist to measure a player’s reaction time, which is slower after a concussion, but most require a computer and sophisticated software. A simple new technique can be used on the sidelines and meets the budgets of almost all teams.

headline.main: A Simple Device to Detect Concussions

docs.snippet: Though New Jersey voters have consistently rejected Republicans — even moderate ones — running for U.S. Senate over the past 40 years, the newly nominated GOP candidate kicked off the state's general special election Wednesday by tryin...
docs.lead_paragraph: Though New Jersey voters have consistently rejected Republicans — even moderate ones — running for U.S. Senate over the past 40 years, the newly nominated GOP candidate kicked off the state's general special election Wednesday by trying to sell them on his conservative ideology with a clear anti-government message.
